boat.construction_details: Iroko on oak frames with teak deck.

for_sales.sales_text:
"Eljada" is a 1964 Francis Jones design, Sole Bay diesel motor ketch. She is built of iroko on oak frames with teak deck. 35" LOA, 10" beam 5" draft. Main mast 21", mizzen mast 15". Bermudan ketch rig. New kit includes mainsail, jib and saloon upholstery, though further equipment is required.

An option of dinghy and outboard is available.

boat.full_description: 'Eljada' is a 1964 Francis Jones design, Sole Bay diesel motor ketch. She is built of iroko on oak frames with teak deck.
boat.name: Eljada
boat.short_description: 'Eljada' [named after a warrior from The Old Testament ] is a Bermudan ketch motor sailor and was built of iroko on oak for a British Army officer about 1964 by Staniland's of Thorn near Doncaster, Yorkshire.
